text:
@SecPompeo The Republican agenda is to continue ignoring science & economics, bailing out Big Oil & Gas corporations, while killing renewable energy.

Destroying the economy & planet Earth.

Looting USA in the wake of their pandemic failures.

https://t.co/Z6uDYio4hh
